entry.summary:
Rebuilding decafsucks.com as an OSS Hanami 2.0 example app

Decaf Sucks

Decaf Sucks was once a thriving little cafe review app and community.

Weâ€™re going to rebuild it as an OSS Hanami 2.0 example application. Watch this space!

Setup

Make sure you have Ruby installed, and Postgres running, then run:

bin/setup
